author: Simon Difford
description: Simple, but simplicity can be beautiful.
name: Highball (Generic Name)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
Ginger ale, soda, tonic water or other carbonated mixer

recipeInstructions.text: POUR spirit into ice-filled glass and TOP with a carbonated soft drink (ginger ale, soda or tonic water)
